sub_topic: Probability of a certain stock price change
message_1: A stock is currently trading at $100 per share. Based on historical data, there is a 60% chance that the stock price will increase by 10% in the next month and a 40% chance that the stock price will decrease by 5% in the next month. What is the probability that the stock price will be at least $105 at the end of the month?
message_2:
To determine the probability that the stock price will be at least $105 at the end of the month, we need to consider the scenario where the stock price increases by 10%. 

Since there is a 60% chance that the stock price will increase by 10%, the probability that the stock price will be at least $105 at the end of the month is 60%.
